cwe.@Name: Inappropriate Source Code Style or Formatting
cwe.Description:
The source code does not follow
				desired style or formatting for indentation, white
				space, comments, etc.

Submission.Submission_Comment: Entry derived from Common Quality Enumeration (CQE) Draft 0.9.
